tool_description: Get all job offers from startupjobs.cz.
name: StartupJobs
title: StartupJobs

api_list.name: Job offers
api_list.description: Get all job offers. Job offers are refreshing every 5 minutes.

optional_parameters.name: filters
optional_parameters.description:
A query to filter results.

Following operations are supported:
![](https://api.kub3c19.dev/public/img/operations.png?v=1)

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated list of fields that are to be returned in results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return. If not specified, the limit is 10.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description:
An ordering query. For example:

order=isRemote desc,name

Above call will return results ordered by name in ascending order and then by isRemote in descending order.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Position to start fetching results from. Used for pagination.
